metadata.title: CVE-2017-14152 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A mishandled zero case was discovered in opj_j2k_set_cinema_parameters inlib/openjp2/j2k.c in OpenJPEG 2.2.0. The vulnerability causes anout-of-bounds write, which may lead to remote denial of service (heap-basedbuffer overflow affecting opj_write_bytes_LE in lib/openjp2/cio.c andopj_j2k_write_sot in lib/openjp2/j2k.c) or possibly remote code execution.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
